Virginia_Beach.Dr. John Miller-Masury House: Dr. John Miller-Masury House, also known as Lakeside (1906–1935), Crystal Club (1935–1939), and Greystone Manor (1942-present), is a historic home located at Virginia Beach, Virginia. It was built in 1906–1908, and is a ​2 1⁄2-story, five-bay, L-shaped stone-and-slate dwelling.
